body_html:
@peterjc123 Thanks.

An update:
This issue is solved by

  1. uninstalling & reinstalling Anaconda
  2. conda update --all

Stil not quite sure what caused it but it looks like the most recent release of Anaconda 5.1 (as of 2018/5/20) is not ready for PyTorch 0.4.0 unless you manually update packages by conda update --all after installing.

body:
@peterjc123 Thanks. 

An update:
This issue is solved by 

1) uninstalling & reinstalling Anaconda 
2) conda update --all

Stil not quite sure what caused it but it looks like the most recent release of Anaconda 5.1 (as of 2018/5/20) is not ready for PyTorch 0.4.0 unless you manually update packages by conda update --all after installing.
